name: skillgarden
description: Multi-plugin marketplace for Docker best practices with enforced git-flow branch protection

plugins.name: branch-guardian
plugins.description: Enforces git-flow branch protection - blocks direct commits to main/develop

plugins.name: docker-mastery
plugins.description: Docker best practices: optimized Dockerfiles, multi-stage builds, compose configurations

plugins.name: gitmastery
plugins.description: Git workflow validation - enforces explicit file staging, conventional commits, and blocks AI footers
